text:
Sarunyoo Wongkrachang (17 October 1960 – 10 June 2020) was a Thai actor, director, screenwriter, singer, producer, activist and host. He was born in Samut Songkhram Province, Thailand. He was known for starring as Lord Jom Rajasena in "Ong Bak 2" (2008) and "Ong Bak 3" (2010) and as Surachi in "13 Beloved" (2006). He also directed and wrote "Kon Khon" (2011).
Wongkrachang died on 10 June 2020 of liver cancer at a hospital in Bangkok, aged 59.
